description.overview: This is an autonomous LLM agent that is a friendly HR assistant. It can assist the user on questions related to HR.
description.interaction_protocol: The agent can be interacted with through the browser in its website. The website features a chat interface in the center. The user writes a prompt and clicks on send. The agent executes it and returns the result, and finishes execution.
description.agent_capabilities: The agent can perform CRUD operations on the database. It can also handle HR related question answering regarding HR policies, timekeeping, etc.

definition.test_setup: The agent is accessible at localhost:8501
